channel.description: Recent content in Mushrooms on Rabbit Hole 223

item.title: YouTube Bans Second Reishi Mushroom Video
item.description: Introduction I posted a quick short on my Reishi mushrooms second flush status, YouTube gave me a warning, removed the video, and gave my channel a strike. I tried to contact support via X as my last Reishi video labeled narcotics was Current Warning and a Strike See the Banned video on Rumble Hi Rabbithole 223, Our team has reviewed your content, and, unfortunately, we think it violates our sale of regulated goods policy.
